content.description:
Dic mihi cur, post conversionemconversio, -onis, f.: conversion nostram, quam nobis 
tu solus facere decrevistidecresco, -ere, decrevi: to decide, in tantam negligentiamnegligentia, -ae, f.: neglect 
tibi venerim.
content.question: In the passage, quam tu solus facere decrevisti is translated

choices.label: who decided to make you alone do it
which you alone decided to be done
which thing alone I decided to do
which you alone decided to do

content.answer: which you alone decided to do
